wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Thomas Herbert John Chapman Goodwin  (24 May 1871 – 29 September 1960), known as Sir John Goodwin, was a British soldier and medical practitioner, who served as the Governor of Queensland from 1927 to 1932.

response: * 1927-1932 Sir Thomas Herbert John Chapman Goodwin
*John Goodwin (British Army officer) (Thomas Herbert John Chapman Goodwin, 1871–1960), Governor of Queensland
